item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

can someone make cache autodownloading?

[code]public class CacheDownloader {

    private client client;
	client frame;
    private final int BUFFER = 1024;
	/* OPTIONS START HERE *///----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    /* OPTION 1 */private final int VERSION = 1 ;   // Version of cache, make it +1 if you updated your cache on your remote server
	/* OPTION 2 */private final int pauseHandlerDelay = 1000 ;   // 1000  = 1 second. This is for when ever the pauseHandler void is called. It just pauses the entire code for the amount of time set.
    /* OPTION 3*/private String cacheLink = " " ;   // URL of cache on remote server. IE: "IDK WHAT SHOULD BE HERE"
	/* OPTION 4 */private String cacheDir = "C:/LostLegacyV1/LostLegacyV1" ;   // Local link to cache directory - Same as sign.signlink.findcachedir() - Remember trailing '/' 
	/* OPTIONS END HERE *///--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    private String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName();
    public CacheDownloader(client client) {
            this.client = client;
    }[/code]

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73757294/LostLegacy/LostLegacyV1.zip this is cache.zip link

Read full topic
